DOC.brief_summary: Nasal High Flow ( NHF ) CPAP establish form respiratory support neonate often produce similar clinical outcome . The aim study investigate airway pressure NHF CPAP neonate .
DOC.brief_title: Airway Pressure During Nasal High Flow CPAP Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : A physiological study measure pressure intra-nasally micro ( 750 Âµm ) pressure probe ( Millar , USA ) 10 ( 5M / 5F ) healthy newborn mean gestation age 37.18 ( SD 1.29 ) wk mean birth weight 2414 ( SD 503.13 ) g. NHF apply 8 L/min ( AIRVO 2 ) small ( OPT 314 ) large ( OPT 316 ) Optiflow nasal cannula ; CPAP 5 cmH20 produce Bubble CPAP system nasal mask interface constant flow 8 L/min ( Fisher & Paykel Healthcare , NZ ) . Values express cmH20 mean standard deviation ( SD ) .
